Title: SilverBox
Description:
SilverBox (aka SilverlightHelper) is a silverlight class library that helps you to develope faster your apps.

- Logging
- Debugging
- Serialization
- Mouse events (Double Click or Mouse Wheel on a DataGrid)
- VisualTree Helper
- Common Extension Methods

It's developed in C#.
